description: A Python script that functions as a database test runner for a multitenant time tracker application using PostgreSQL. It performs various validation tests including connection, schema, version, permissions, and external extension support, as well as executing SQL-based validation tests from an external file. It generates and saves a comprehensive report of all tests executed.

classes.name: DatabaseTestRunner
classes.description: A class responsible for establishing database connection, executing validation tests (both individual and SQL script-based), reporting results, and managing connection lifecycle.

methods.name: __init__(self, connection_string: str)
methods.description: Initializes the DatabaseTestRunner with a database connection string.

methods.name: bool connect(self)
methods.description: Establishes a connection to the PostgreSQL database.

methods.name: disconnect(self)
methods.description: Closes the database connection if it is open.

methods.name: List[Tuple[str,bool,str]] run_sql_test_file(self, test_file_path: str)
methods.description: Executes an SQL test file and extracts pass/fail/skipped results based on notices.

methods.name: List[Tuple[str,bool,str]] run_individual_tests(self)
methods.description: Performs various built-in validation tests such as connection, schema, version, permissions, and UUID extension availability.

methods.name: str generate_report(self, all_results: List[Tuple[str, bool, str]])
methods.description: Generates a formatted summary report of test results, including counts and details.

methods.name: bool run_all_tests(self, sql_test_file: str = None)
methods.description: Runs all individual and SQL file tests, produces a report, saves it to a file, and returns overall success status.

ctags.name: generate_report
ctags.pattern: /^    def generate_report(self, all_results: List[Tuple[str, bool, str]]) -> str:$/

ctags.name: run_all_tests
ctags.pattern: /^    def run_all_tests(self, sql_test_file: str = None) -> bool:$/

ctags.name: run_sql_test_file
ctags.pattern: /^    def run_sql_test_file(self, test_file_path: str) -> List[Tuple[str, bool, str]]:$/
